title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:

13:04 <Chami> has joined #xwiki  
13:08 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
13:12 <abusenius> has quit  
13:38 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
13:52 <@sdumitriu> Could I get an agreement on the users module?  
13:52 <@sdumitriu> Can I merge it on master?  
13:53 <+tmortagne> sdumitriu: checking last state  
13:54 <@sdumitriu> I sent a list of reqs and usecases  
13:54 <@sdumitriu> http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/UserModuleRequirements  
13:55 <@sdumitriu> UC12 addresses your last comment: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/34a0f83c354ac68eca75c7141133f94ae9049e47#commitcomment-371656  
13:55 <+tmortagne> (btw I just merged xwiki repository)  
13:57 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
13:57 <+tmortagne> I would prefer getProfileDocument to not be part of final User API  
13:58 <+tmortagne> appart from this I'm ok with the merge  
14:00 <+tmortagne> sdumitriu: about UC12 I don't like too much having to support that either (I even sent a mail some time ago to get rid of all theses relative stuff) but since it's a current "feature" I wanted to know if you avoided it on purpose or not  
14:01 <+tmortagne> i'm sure you will have comment from Ludo when he will finally read his mail about that ;)  
14:05 <@sdumitriu> There was a message from Ludo some time ago about UC12, when another change broke the behavior  
14:05 <@sdumitriu> Do you remember what was the context?  
14:05 <mpaun> has joined #xwiki  
14:06 <mpaun> has quit  
14:06 <mpaun> has joined #xwiki  
14:07 <mpaun> has quit  
14:08 <mpaun> has joined #xwiki  
14:12 <+tmortagne> sdumitriu: the mail I just indicated, it was voted and then reverted because of this Ludo -1  
14:13 <mpaun> has quit  
14:21 <+tmortagne> sdumitriu: http://markmail.org/message/jegadfz7dilb46nz  
14:21 <+tmortagne> here it is  
14:22 <@sdumitriu> Right  
14:22 <@sdumitriu> Thanks  
14:23 <+tmortagne> was actually a bit more generic that users  
14:23 <abusenius> has quit  
14:26 <@sdumitriu> Ludovic's veto was because links won't be relative anymore  
14:26 <+tmortagne> yes which is what I'm talking about too  
14:27 <@sdumitriu> And his problem was about import/export  
14:27 <@sdumitriu> I think that case could be handled separately  
14:27 <+tmortagne> actually it was about direct sql  
14:27 <+tmortagne> since you can make the reference relaive in export  
14:30 <+tmortagne> the "problem" with User#getId is that there is not even relative notion at all anymore  
14:30 <+tmortagne> so you will store a prefixed full name  
14:30 <+tmortagne> because you don't know it's actually a document so you can't really store it as relative  
14:31 <+tmortagne> so you do have the same result that made Ludo vote -1  
14:31 <@sdumitriu> Then, let's hope he won't notice this :)  
14:32 <@sdumitriu> Kidding, I'll ping him about this  
14:32 <+tmortagne> :)  
14:36 <Chami> has left #xwiki  
14:40 <+sburjan> sdumitriu: got time for a small commit ? :)  
14:41 <@sdumitriu> Yep  
14:49 <+sburjan> ok. syncing my fork with origin and pushing  
14:53 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
14:56 <SvenDowideit> has joined #xwiki  
15:12 <evalica> has quit  
15:16 <+sburjan> sdumitriu: check requests  
15:17 <@sdumitriu> Looking  
15:21 <@cjdelisle> When you did the update of myxwiki, were you able to load pages or was everything hung?  
15:21 <@sdumitriu> Hung  
15:22 <@cjdelisle> Well 3.1M1 works on my desktop  
15:22 <@cjdelisle> maybe there's a hard link that didn't show up in your find -l?  
15:22 <@sdumitriu> Before actually being able to make requests (before the "server started" log message)  
15:22 <@sdumitriu> I doubt it  
15:23 <@cjdelisle> I have it working here on tomcat w/ postgres  
15:24 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
15:42 <@cjdelisle> I noticed something interesting. Turn on noscript, page load time is cut in half.  
15:45 <@sdumitriu> Yep  
15:45 <@sdumitriu> JS takes a lot of time  
15:46 <@cjdelisle> I think it's all of the tcp connections ech having to slow start  
15:47 <@cjdelisle> hehe actually that could be my fault modding ff to use 30 connections instead of 2  
15:48 <@cjdelisle> anyway it'd be interesting to try downloading the same amount of js in 1 file and see if it's noticably faster.  
16:03 <abusenius> has quit  
16:09 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
16:30 <abusenius> has quit  
16:35 <sburjan> has quit  
16:53 <sdumitriu> has quit  
17:00 <Chami> has joined #xwiki  
17:12 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
17:26 <+tmortagne> I get something weird on trunk, the manu bar is totally broken  
17:26 <+tmortagne> \*menu  
17:27 <+tmortagne> installing screengrab  
17:29 <lucaa> has quit  
17:29 <+tmortagne> http://tinypic.com/r/3tp51/7  
17:29 <+tmortagne> (yes I cleaned by browser cache)  
17:30 <+tmortagne> did not had the issue yesterday  
17:30 <+tmortagne> looks mostly related to color theme  
17:31 <+tmortagne> all actually seems to work  
17:31 <+tmortagne> ha actually loks like the wrong skin is used  
17:31 <+tmortagne> it's not colibri  
17:33 <+tmortagne> it's like XWiki.DefaultSkin was not taken into account (it has the right skin and xwiki.cfg has xwiki.defaultbaseskin=albatross)  
17:35 <+tmortagne> note that ?skin=colibri does not work better but ?skin=toucan does so it's actually something wrong with colibri skin  
17:35 <+sburjan`> yepp  
17:35 <+sburjan`> soems so  
17:35 <+sburjan`> try putting the dir name in the Skin name  
17:35 <+sburjan`> instrad of XWiki.DefaultXWikiSkin  
17:36 <+sburjan`> instead of XWiki.DefaultSkin  
17:36 <+tmortagne> looking what's in colibri skin to make that fail that whay  
17:36 <+tmortagne> hmm colibri is almost empty  
17:37 <+tmortagne> ther is no css or images file like in toucan  
17:37 <+tmortagne> and only 7 imaage and css files directly in the root folder  
17:37 <+tmortagne> checking github  
17:38 <+tmortagne> same thing in github  
17:45 <+tmortagne> should be ok with colibri as base skin I guess  
17:46 <+tmortagne> ok I need to update xwiki-debug-eclipse with new xwiki.cfg
